title: Smart Data Models - SynchronousMachineDynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Synchronous machine whose behaviour is described by reference to a standard model expressed in one of the following forms:

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SynchronousMachineDynamics

ExcitationSystemDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation system model associated with this synchronous machine model. Default: None

GenICompensationForGenJ.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Compensation of voltage compensator`s generator for current flow out of this  generator. Default: 'list'

MechanicalLoadDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Mechanical load model associated with this synchronous machine model. Default: None

SynchronousMachine.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Synchronous machine to which synchronous machine dynamics model applies. Default: None

TurbineGovernorDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Synchronous machine model with which this turbine-governor model is associated. Default: 'list'
